item.title: Fox carcass in grass at back of fences, 22nd January
item.description:
Dead fox in the grass on the right-hand side as you look up towards the steps going up Plumstead Common. It’s near the fences of the two houses in from corner.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tormount Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegally Dumped Waste in garden, 22nd January
item.description:
Illegally Dumped Waste in garden. No building work taking place at property. Waste was transferred from a van on the street. Make FORD Model TRANSIT 290 TREND LR P/V Colour Blue Year of manufacture 2016 Date of offence 17.12.2025

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belvoir Road, East Dulwich, Greater London

item.title: Rubbish scattered along pavement, 22nd January
item.description:
There is a large amount of rubbish scattered along the pavement and roadside on Procupine Close. This is causing an unpleasant environment and may attract pests. I would appreciate it if this could be cleaned as soon as possible. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Porcupine Close, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant flytipping at Lock Fields House, 22nd January
item.description:
Flytipping is an offence and causes health and safety hazards. Please investigate and punish the culprits, this happens regularly

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wadding Street, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shopping Trolley and litter/leaves, 22nd January
item.description:
This alleyway has not been cleaned for over 3 months. There is a dumped shopping trolley and cans everywhere. Leaves have not been collected since last year. We live by Norris Skip yard and it is encouraging rats into the alley.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Millfields Close, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dirt from number 15 front garden blocking road in chaucer road, 22nd January
item.description:
There is building works going on at number 15 chaucer road and they are leaving all the dirt from the front garden in the road and this is spilling over into half the road and causing lots of traffic issues and access problems. this has been there for around 2 days and they are digging more so only going to get worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chaucer Road, Falconwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car blocking side entrance for over 4 days, 22nd January
item.description:
Car has been parked on the double yellows, blocking a side entrance since Sunday. Parking ticket was only applied yesterday.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Speldhurst Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 22nd January
item.description:
Internal door dumped on the pavement blocking it for people to safely use the pavement. People with pushchairs & wheelchairs would be unable to pass safely & would have to use the road at a very busy & dangerous junction.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 100, Clarendon Way, St Paul's Cray, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Needs disinfecting daily!, 22nd January
item.description:
This part of the area on our stairs by the chutes needs disinfecting with a strong chemicals and good scrubbing! It’s been observed by residents that some drug users and homeless people congregate at this very spot and eventually leave mess behind (urine and drug paraphernalia) Please sent our cleaner there frequently Many residents in our building have children and pets!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glengall Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped for 2 weeks - rats and foxes seen, 22nd January
item.description:
Please clear - this has been dumped for two weeks. I have seen multiple Royal Borough of Greenwich staff (who work at the social housing block) blindly walk past this on multiple occasions on different days. Thieve tickets continuously instantaneously get marked as fixed - when they are not. I will be raising this with the MP

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mulgrave Road, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous incorrect road markings, 22nd January
item.description:
The old road markings have not been removed and vehicles are swerving to avoid a hatched area that has not been burned off properly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Cray Road, Bexley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hazardous pavement and grass verge through damage to grass verge from contact vehicle use in Welling Way o/s 184 & 186, 22nd January
item.description:
Hazardous pavement and grass verge through damage to grass verge from contact vehicle use in Welling Way o/s 184 & 186. This has happened before and was looked at last year and residents were spoken to but the same issue has now happened again. Please can this be looked in to.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 188, Welling Way, Avery Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Food waste bin emptied on pavement, 22nd January
item.description:
The contents of a food waste bin is strewn across the pavement. This includes rotting food and is attracting vermin. Please could someone kindly clean?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Shenley Road, Peckham, Greater London
